_header: And there did…mekely for his love
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 156.3; and also see TP 1592.5; for another version see 4913.
Subjects: Hailes (Gloucs.), Cistercian abbey; Christ, blood of; miracles
_description: An advertisement for Hailes Abbey, including four miracles associated with the Holy Blood of Hailes — thirty-six stanzas rhyme royal
